title: Gamification-Based Technical Writing Masterclass

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Game element-integrated education conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can compose documents using the standard structure of technical documents (overview/body/conclusion) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve technical documents by incorporating feedback at least three times through game missions.
Learners can evaluate the clarity, accuracy, and consistency of technical documents on a 4-point scale (1–4) via a peer assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
